entry.title: Thursday night: Blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Blowing snow late in the evening and overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes.
